subject: Thank you for your recent refinance application, we are ready to lend you money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your current payments by a third or more, here is the deal we can offer you THIS EVENING (hurry, this offer will expire THIS NIGHT):
$229,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest payments!
Hurry, when best deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this user-friendly form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit score will not disqualify you!
http://swimaunland.com/
